articles.author: Alan Shope
articles.title: Treatment is starting to evolve for tens of thousands still suffering from long COVID - KMBC Kansas City
articles.description: The effects of long COVID are still plaguing tens of thousands of Americans
articles.content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. —We're closing in on four years since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic.
The effects of long COVID are still plaguing tens of thousands of Americans. 
Some sufferers, like 20-year… [+1982 chars]

articles.author: Noah Sheidlower
articles.title: Wealthy Americans say it's getting harder for them to get richer - Business Insider
articles.description: Two-thirds of wealthy Americans with investable assets over $500,000 don't feel wealthy thanks to inflation, climate change, and economic uncertainty.
articles.content:
Even America's wealthiest people aren't feeling too rich these days, and some say that's because it's getting harder to grow their hoards.
A new survey from insurance company Chubb
